CHAT.comment: DAVID BOBBY, WARDEN, Petitioner v. MICHAEL BIES.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 11:02 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF BENJAMIN C. MIZER ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF JOHN H. BLUME ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENT
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF BENJAMIN C. MIZER ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
(Whereupon, at 11:54 a.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
